# streamkap_tag (Resource)

Manages a **Streamkap tag** for organizing and categorizing resources.

Tags can be applied to sources, destinations, and pipelines to help organize and filter resources in the Streamkap UI.

[Documentation](https://docs.streamkap.com/streamkap-provider-for-terraform)



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Display name of the tag. This is shown in the Streamkap UI.
- `type` (List of String) List of entity types this tag can be applied to. Valid values: `sources`, `destinations`, `pipelines`.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Optional description of the tag's purpose.

### Read-Only

- `custom` (Boolean) Whether this is a custom (user-created) tag. **Read-only**.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the tag. Generated by Streamkap on creation.
- `system` (Boolean) Whether this is a system-managed tag. System tags cannot be modified. **Read-only**.
